akas: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (original title)
akas from release info: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (original title)

1.title: The New Step

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Miyata has an OPBF title match coming up with Arnie Gregory who's nicknamed Crocodile because his strikes are said to be like a crocodile's jaw. Miyata struggles with his weight. The OPBF title match is ready to begin.

2.title: Bloody Cross

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Miyata's OPBF title match with Arnie Gregory beings, Miyata takes the first round, downing Arnie. The second round Arnie knocks Miyata down twice using the bloody cross which frustrates Miyata.

3.title: To the Promised Place

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Arnie tells his manager, Mr. Sakaguchi, that Miyata is the greatest challenge he fought. In the third round, Miyata takes a lot of hits and is in bad shape although Arnie doesn't knock him out which makes Mr. Sakaguchi angry with Arnie.

4.title: Movement Towards the World

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Miyata and Arnie's title match comes to an end. Takamura beats the 2nd in the world in the third round. Eiji Date has a WBA world featherweight title match against Champion Ricardo Martinez, a man with 62 matches and 62 wins and 58 KOs.

5.title: The Strength of the World

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Ippo spars with the world champion, Ricardo Martinez and Miyata spars with Martinez's challenger, Eiji Date, both Date, and Martinez win their sparring matches effortlessly.

6.title: A Figure to Chase After

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: After seven years Eiji Date will finally have his rematch with Ricardo Martinez, the world featherweight champion. The title match begins, Date starts the match off with two lefts, the second landing on the champion's face.

7.title: The Advent of the Devil

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: The world featherweight title match has begun, in the first round, neither Date or Martinez use their rights. The second round is more exciting than the first. In the third round, Martinez steps it up and becomes more aggressive.

8.title: Spirit for One Last Attack

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Date tries the heart-breaker shot but Martinez blocks it with his elbow breaking Date's hand. By the end of the round Date's hand, jaw, and ribs are broken. After ten rounds the match has a winner.

9.title: Qualifying for Succession

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Itagaki Manabu, last years inter-high runner up joins the Kamogawa gym. Ippo has a new opponent called Hammer Nao who is someone Ippo and the guys know.

10.title: Cannon Fodder

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: During their weigh-in, Ippo and Yamada are told to shake hands but Yamada says he'll take Ippo's belt. Aoki has his match before Ippo which ends in a decision. Yamada tells his coach that no matter the outcome of his match he'll retire.

11.title: Ippo vs Hammer Nao

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: The match between Ippo and Yamada starts, when it does Ippo rushes out trying to end the match as quickly as possible. Ippo manages to knock Yamada down two times in the first round. The second round Yamada gets some powerful body blows in.

12.title: What It Means to Be a Pro

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Ippo has a hard time with Yamada's Solar Plexus Blow. The match ends in round two and after the match, Yamada decides he won't retire.

13.title: Ippo on the Beach 2

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Takamura, Kimura, and Itagaki go to the beach because of their training camp while Aoki and Ippo go to the beach with Kumi and Tomiko, the two don't train because of they both had a match recently.

14.title: Two Sparring

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: Ippo has a sparring match with Itagaki and knocks him down four times in three rounds. Ippo has another sparring match and this time it's with Imai Kyosuke, a boxer with an amateur record of 35 matches and 35 wins.

15.title: Itagaki's Debut Match!

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: Itagaki, Kimura, and Takamura all have matches with the opener being Itagaki's debut followed by Kimura and After that is the main event, Takamura.

16.title: The 2 Hawks

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: Takamura did a bad job with his weight management making him weak and fatigued, on top of that his punches are light. Takamura's fight comes to an end. Brain Hawk tells everyone that he came to Japan for the women.

17.title: Wild Child

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: Takamura throws a punch at Bryan Hawk which he stops by grabbing Takamura's fist. Kimura, Ippo, and Aoki meet Takamura's older sister and younger brother, the three find out a lot more about Takamura and his family.

18.title: Extreme Weight Control

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

18.plot: Takamura, Ippo, and Kimura shave off Aoki's eyebrows. Takamura struggles with his extreme weight control regime.

19.title: Explosive Confrontation

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

19.plot: Takamura. At the press conference, Bryan Hawk hits Takamura as well as Kamogawa and says things that makes him very unpopular with the Japanese. Ippo tells Takamura that he'll get a first round knockout.

20.title: World Jr. Middle Weight Title Match

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

20.plot: Ippo gets a first round KO like he said. Before Takamura's match, the Japanese champions from almost all the weight classes talk with Takamura, Date, Sendo, and Miyata too. Both Takamura and Bryan Hawk make their grand entrances.

21.title: The Battle of the Hawks!

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

21.plot: The world title match starts with both Takamura and Bryan Hawk staring each other down, Takamura makes the first move and hits Hawk a little but is surprised by Hawk's strange angled punches. Takamura and Hawk both show their great speed.

22.title: Battle Fight!

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

22.plot: The world title match's momentum keeps switching between Takamura and Bryan Hawk with both of them having landed multiple knock downs.

23.title: Supporting Hand

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

23.plot: Takamura tries to end the match before the 5th round ends because of his weight management he can't fight more than five rounds. In the 6th round, Takamura gets hit for almost the whole round but gets two hits in and survives the round.

24.title: The King

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

24.plot: In the 7th round Takamura outclasses Hawk and by the end of the round he's scared of Takamura and thinks he's trying to kill him. After a very dramatic ending, the world title match has a winner.

25.title: My Bronze Statue, Please

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

25.plot: After winning his title match Takamura says something to the crowd similar to what Hawk said making them angry. Takamura gets a statue of himself, when trying to move it Aoki breaks it. After Itagaki's first victory Ippo meets his family.

26.title: New Challenger

episode of.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger (TV Series 2009– )

26.plot: The Kamogawa gym has some matches coming up, Ippo's title defense match, Aoki's title match, Itagaki 's round of Rookie kings, and Takamura's title defense match. Miyata wants to fight Ippo but Kamogawa tells Ippo to get stronger first.

imdb.title: Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger
plot: Ippo continues to defend his title and training to reach his goal, Ichiro Miyata. While Takamura goes for the world, and faces the world champion, Brian Hawk. In what is to become his toughest fight so far.::Alexander Schuster Jenssen
